Privacy · Cookie Policy · Terms

Privacy Policy

Last updated:

PsySymbol processes your inputs client‑side to generate interpretations. When “Enrich with web sources (beta)” is enabled, we fetch publicly available summaries to augment the answer. We do not sell personal data. See our Cookie Policy for ad‑related consent.

Information we collect

  • Query text you type to get an interpretation (not linked to your identity).
  • Basic device data (e.g., browser, screen size) to improve compatibility.
  • Ad data from Google AdSense, if you consent, which may use cookies.

Your rights

You can revoke consent at any time via the Cookie controls below.

Cookie Policy & Consent

We use strictly necessary cookies and, if you agree, Google AdSense may set cookies to serve and measure ads. In the EEA/UK we ask for your consent before loading ads.

You can change this later from the footer: Cookie Policy.

Terms of Service

Using PsySymbol means you accept these terms. Interpretations are informational only and not medical, legal, or psychological advice. Do not submit unlawful content. We may update these terms; continued use means acceptance.

About PsySymbol

PsySymbol is a single‑page tool for quick interpretations of dreams, symbols, and numbers—with optional web enrichment. No accounts, no downloads.

Contact

Have a concern about content or ads? Email: hello@psysymbol.com
Cookies for ads? We use Google AdSense. Accept to see personalized or contextual ads. You can change this any time.
